divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving north on I-81 through virginia at about a quarter after 4am my sight was drawn up to the sky by a newly appearing green burst of light, it looked like a signal flare but really big, and it dropped over the horizon with a trail behind it and then, when it fell beyond where I could see, there were 2 flashes of light, as if lightning had flashed twice, but it had a greenish hue and there wasn't any foolowing sound... thats all I saw.
